snippet: Mr. Gianakos’s disjunctive, cartoon allegories of surrealistic perversity are displayed as part of his “New Paintings” exhibition.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews drawings by Steve Gianakos at Fredericks & Freiser gallery.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Gianakos’s disjunctive, cartoon allegories of surrealistic perversity are displayed as part of his “New Paintings” exhibition.

headline.main: Steve Gianakos’s ‘New Paintings’ at Fredericks & Freiser
